statements: DELETE FROM live_broadcast_data WHERE viewer_count > 500 AND chat_activity LIKE '%positive%';
DELETE FROM LiveBroadcastViewers WHERE viewer_id = 100 AND viewer_count > 50;
DELETE FROM BroadcastStats WHERE total_viewers < 1000 AND start_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM viewer_engagement_data WHERE broadcast_id = 123 AND viewers_count > 1000;
DELETE FROM ChatActivity WHERE viewer_id = 205 AND broadcast_id = 101;
DELETE FROM chat_activity WHERE broadcast_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM broadcasts WHERE start_time > '2022-05-01' AND end_time < '2022-06-01';
